Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Affords certain members of the fire department pension fund with new or increased pension benefits for each year of additional service beyond their required minimum service
Summary: Affords certain members of the fire department pension fund with new or increased pension benefits for each year of additional service beyond their required minimum service.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-359, NYC Ad Cd; add ยง503-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to affording certain uniformed members of the New York city fire department pension fund with an increased pension benefit for each year of additional service beyond their required minimum service; and to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to affording certain police/fire members of the New York city fire department pension fund to continue in service past normal retirement age with an additional pension benefit for each year of additional service beyond their required minimum service
